Title: Las Cruces Sun-News - Las Cruces Sun-News (NM)
Summary: New Mexico Governor Susana Martinez made a plea June 22, 2011, for residents and visitors to help prevent wildfires. More restrictions were placed on public lands and firefighters battled blazes north of Santa Fe and along the border with Arizona.So far this fiscal year, she said, 791 fires, more than 640,000 acres have burned and 100 structures have been destroyed, including about 40 homes. The cost of fighting the fires is expected to exceed $15 million, she said. The Lincoln National Forest and the Santa Fe National Forest were closed.
